author: randall
msg: Increase default size for os process receives
Internal read buffers from erts/emulator/sys/*/sys.c show 64*1024
for UNIX and 4096 for Windows. In case any show/list/etc functions
return large responses this could reduce overhead slightly by
processing fewer messages and should have no negative effects.

author: justin
msg: SLING-2193 - adding JUL support (optionally if framework property org.apache.sling.commons.log.julenabled is "true")

author: jleroux
msg: Related to the recent UtilValidate.is(Not)Empty() effort. I found the reason, you can't safely pass a FlexibleStringExpander to            UtilValidate.is(Not)Empty. All other cases were all right. Lesson learned the hard way, I put comments about that...
I also refactored, I prefer if/else with only one short expression to be on the same line, notably when return is used (then else is useless)
